dataset.title: Trip Exchange Service - Clearinghouse API and Data Platform
dataset.description: A comprehensive Spring Boot-based web service and API platform that facilitates trip exchange and coordination between transportation service providers. The system enables efficient resource sharing, improved service delivery, and coordination among transit providers. It provides REST APIs for managing trip tickets, claims, partnerships, and provider coordination, along with real-time data exchange capabilities. The platform includes features for trip management, provider partnerships, JWT-based authentication, role-based access control, geospatial data handling, and email notifications. This dataset encompasses both the API service endpoints and the underlying data structures for transportation coordination.
dataset.rights: This data is made available as public domain. There are no restrictions on use, modification, or distribution. The data and API are provided 'as is' without warranty of any kind.
dataset.spatial: Not geographically restricted - applicable to transportation service coordination nationally

distribution.title: Trip Exchange REST API
distribution.description: RESTful API providing programmatic access to trip exchange functionality including authentication, provider management, trip tickets, claims, and partnerships.

distribution.title: OpenAPI Specification
distribution.description: Machine-readable API specification in OpenAPI 3.0 format describing all available endpoints, request/response schemas, and authentication requirements.

distribution.title: Source Code Repository
distribution.description: Complete source code for the Trip Exchange Service platform including API implementations, data models, security configurations, and deployment scripts.

distribution.title: Database Schema Scripts
distribution.description: SQL scripts for database initialization and trip ticket data generation.

distribution.title: API Documentation
distribution.description: Human-readable API documentation and authentication guide.
